that was cheap I was excited
the next morning I got a strange email
from the property owner that said dear
Christian this is a small basement room

for thinner people oh yeah yeah from
your picture you appear to be a large
man do you mind me asking how much you
weigh all the best Susan
somehow I don't think she meant all the

in your basement
this probably isn't necessary now that
I'm not staying there but I weighed 300

didn't accidentally book one of those
rooms into which my body couldn't
possibly fit that would have been so

shoving me through the doorframe and
